turkish_example_sentence: Ben hiçbir şey sormaacaktım ama cesaret bulamadım.
english_example_sentence: I was not going to ask anything but I could not find courage.
russian_example_sentence: Я не собирался ничего спрашивать, но я не нашел смелости.
